summary: The Contoso Wireless product phone is a 5.7-inch HD device with a 1.4 GHz octa-core processor, 4GB RAM, 32GB internal storage, and a 3,000mAh battery. It comes with a one year limited warranty and is preloaded with several apps including Contoso App Store, Contoso Cloud Services, and Contoso Video Streaming. The phone is compatible with both GSM and CDMA networks and supports LTE bands 1/2/3/4/5/7/8/12/17/20/38/40. It also has several special features such as a fingerprint scanner, facial recognition technology, and an AI assistant. The phone costs $399 USD and comes with unlimited data, talk, and text plans for $60 per month with no annual contracts or hidden fees. Additional lines can be added for just $30 each per month.
